page.title: 09Favourite Games
page.content:
My favourite game is Tag. You have some friends and you say what is Denno. This means a safe place, like a wall or a tree. You say what is Denno and someone is on it. They have to chase you and touch you and sometimes you get the person and tag them then they have to be the chaser.If they are on Denno they are safe and if they get off you can tag them. It is a good game. It makes you nice and warm.
My favourite game is Pass the Parcel. You have a parcel and you sit in a circle and you pass the parcel to the person sitting next to you and when the music stops the person who has got it has to take a layer of paper off, until all the paper is off and the person who's got the last paper off wins what is inside. By Bilson Infant Children.
